title: Error 004
body:
So, the new Galio came out! I was pretty excited to try the new Galio, but there was a error while updating. I tried updating my computer ,but it kept showing the Error 004. .It would be appreciated if someone can tell me how to fix this problem.


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: It sucks running into that error when you just want to play with Galio!  This error can happen if you're running into a network issue failing to reach the patching server.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get you updated and in-game with Galio.  :D  Let me know if you have any questions!

I took this from a different post on the boards, hope it helps. 

"1) ON the bottom of your window of your desktop right click league of legends icon and close window.

2) It will ask you if you are sure you want to close league, say NO (do this 2-3 times and it will keep the login and the continual loop of restart will go away)."
